title: Navy in focus. Island sailors
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Papua New Guinea - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Navy
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Armed forces - training
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Recruiting and enlistment
description: Shows training of native recruits for the Papua New Guinea Division, Royal Australian Navy, at Manus Island and in Australia. Training includes strategy on land, at sea, survival at sea, as well as technical instruction in engineering, navigation, radio operating and other specialised fields. Shows an intensive campaign of recruitment throughout the island, and the enthusiastic response of the Papua New Guineans.
